name: Miner Up
description:
Miner up! How deep can you go to bring as much gold on top? But be warned, as spiders are just around to take them away from you!

Produced for the Brackey's Game Jam 2020.2 "Rewind".

OBJECT OF THE GAME
Gather as many golds as you can!
Space-bar to start descending. You'll start going up when you get the first gold.
So when that happens, try to collect as many as you can on the way up.
Make sure to avoid spiders as the take the gold away from you.

CONTROLS
= start descending
/  = movement

CREDITS
Programming: Scott Cameron & Kendrick Villaruel
Artists: John Steven & Kei Cyanyan
Music & SFX: Nate Aldemita
Concept: Steve Cameron
